Sarah Abbett

9974 Old Wagon Trail · Eden Prairie, MN 55347 · (970) 471-5420

I am a full stack developer who’s proficient in HTML, CSS and Javascript. As a former flight attendant and purser, I have 24 years of customer service and leadership experience. I’m looking to put my exceptional communication and teamwork skills to use as a developer. I look forward to working as part of a team of engineers to create quality software through collaboration with an emphasis on customer service. I have experience creating interactive web applications using React, as well as building APIs with Express and PostgreSQL.

Interests

Apart from web development, I enjoy yoga, skiing in Colorado and spending time on the lake in Minnesota. I love to travel and explore new places. I have had so many amazing experiences through my travels.

I love to cook and bake for my family. Some of my recent favorites are Honey Oat Sourdough and Instant Pot White Chicken Chili. I'm always looking for new recipes to try.

Periodic Tables

This project demonstrates my ability to create a full stack application. It is a restaurant reservation system. The requirements of the project include CRUD operations for reservations and tables, searching and validation.
